page.title: 03Family Life,Stevenage.
page.content: In my{family}there are four people,my father and my mother ,my sister and myself.We live in a semi_detached {house}in Lonsdale Road in Pin Green. Our house has two bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs ,and a kitchen,hall, sitting room and dining room downstairs.My father{works}in Hatfield at British Aerospace and my mother is a housewife.My sister goes to Nobel Secondary School; I go to Pin Green J.M.I.School.Both of us are Guides,members of the 22nd Stevenage Company.Sometimes we go to the{Welwyn {Sports and Social Club}.In the Winter we usually go there because my father is a linesman and my mother does the tea.My grandparents live in Hatfield and I have{relations}in Welwyn, Hitchin and Langford.
